Articles.Content: Remember how A supply craft collided with Mir? And it hit the spekter module? Well that just happened to me. I was doing a routine docking with mechjeb using the soviet pack when suddenly my craft hit a panel on spekter and went out of control. It was strange because it took out the EXACT SAME PANEL! share your thoughts on this strange coincidence.

Sovjets used mechjeb for docking with MIR too?

You might want to raise a bug against mechjeb then.
It would be funny if the software turned out to be designed by the same person!!
